body:
Hi thank you for the Ladybug/Honeybee tool it has been a great help for my research! I ran the simulation as mentioned in the videos, I noticed that even if I put hourly in time step, Energyplus  runs it for every ten minutes, I would like to get the data out as it is, for ten or 15 mins. How or where should I change the parameter? 

Thank you,

Vinu
topic: Simulation output in 15 minutes time step

replies.body: Hi Vinu - You can use Energy Simulation Par to set it up.
Thank you Mostapha for the quick reply!

Hi Mostapha, I tried doing it but it not changing the output for me... I have attached the file. I am wondering whether other parameters are overwriting it!



Thank you,

Vinu

I think I didn't read your question carefully. If I understand right you are not only looking to run the analysis every 15 minutes but also you are trying to get the results for every 15 minutes? If that is the case then you need to set timestep input for simulationOutputs to timestep. I just made changes to the component to support timestep input. The simulation runs fine but you may not be able to use some of the functionality for visualizing the results. Check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UQSvRDwuxJLmotsYQqzCxQJscU0n4kqcnea5ssKb7u63y-ZejcZGsIjzj4gcEGPydVqOnqtTCJPH0XkA0u2FrrfR4iXHlXLX/resultsTimeStep.png) Mostapha
Thank you, It is working fine!
